Jerson is requesting for a loan for 27,000 PHP, which he will use to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides used to maintain his crops with good quality. Aside from his wife's salary from teaching, selling crops is his family's source of income. With each crop, Jerson is trying to increase his profits. He hopes to increase his income and improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Lezdin Estefani

texts.es:
Lezdin es una joven de 22 años. Vive en la ciudad de Ica al lado de su hijo de 1 años de edad, a quien quiere mucho y saca adelante sola a que el padre de su pequeño la abandono cuando su hijo era un recién nacido. Lezdin es muy alegre a pesar de las adversidades que se le han presentado y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante, ella trabaja en una tienda de venta de ropa, ella trabaja alrededor de 12 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo honrada.

Lezdin está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con su gran apoyo ella podrá comprar una cocina para su hogar ya que actualmente su cocina es a base de leña, de esta manera ella podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguirá esforzándose por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo y poder estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Lezdin, 22, is a young woman living in the city of Ica with her one-year-old son who she loves very much and is raising by herself because her son’s father abandoned her when her son was a newborn.  Lezdin is very cheerful despite the adversities that have arisen and she very much wants to get ahead.  She works in a clothing store about 12 hours daily and can see up to 20 customers per day.  She believes she does well at work because she’s responsible and above all honest.

Lezdin is very grateful to Kiva lenders because with their great support she’ll be able to buy a stove for her home since her current one is wood-burning and she’d be improving her quality of life this way while continuing to strive to make her greatest wish reality: to provide a profession for her son and to study a university career.

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: Anabel

texts.en:
Anabel was involved in an early marriage and has a child now. She is married to a farmer named Gilbert. They live at Lanna. The couple are both farmers, planting and harvesting rice to sell to traders. They have been in the farming business for over five years. She wants to improve her crop yield, and that requires additional capital. On account of this, she is asking for 20,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and insecticides, and to pay for land cultivation for the farming business. 

Someday, she hopes to harvest crops profitably and gain good income from the business. It will help her to save funds for her child's education. She also aims to lift her family out of the poor living conditions they have.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides, and to pay for land cultivation for the farming business.

loans.name: Orfa Argentina

texts.es:
La señora Orfa  tiene 34 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, reside en compañía de  sus padres y esposo  en  una comunidad urbana del municipio Nueva Frontera, Departamento de Santa Bárbara.
Orfa se dedica desde hace un año a la venta de alimentos a través de una cafetería que alquila mensualmente. Ella vende desayunos, almuerzos,  cenas y refrescos.
Con el propósito de construir su propio local, ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por la cantidad 21,000 Lempiras, los que piensa utilizar en la compra de cemento, laminas de zinc, arena, canaleta, pago de mano de obra y accesorios para construcción.
Ella está satisfecha con las utilidades que le genera la venta de alimentos y espera seguir creciendo hasta convertir su negocio en un restaurante muy reconocido en su municipio.
texts.en:
Orfa, age 34, is in a common-law marriage with her husband.  She lives with her parents and husband in an urban community in the Nueva Frontera municipality in the Santa Bárbara department.

Orfa has been selling food for one year through a cafeteria that she rents monthly.  She sells breakfasts, lunches, dinners, and soft drinks.  With the intention of building her own place, she has decided to request a loan for 21,000 lempiras.  She plans to use the loan to buy cement, metal sheets, and gutters.  She will also pay for the labor and construction fittings.

She is happy with the profits that her food business generates for her.  She hopes to continue growing until she converts her business into a well-known restaurant in her municipality.

loans.use: to buy cement, metal sheets, and gutters in order to build her own place.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy stock for a general store.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is married and works hard to support her family.She has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for three years.

Geraldine is requesting a loan through NWTF for 15,000 PHP, which she will use to buy materials needed for her abaca weaving business. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed for her abaca weaving business.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is married with seven children. Alma is 41 years old, residing at Malaubang, Ozamis City, Philippines. 

Alma has spent seven years in her business venture of selling snack foods like banana cue to earn a living. Each month, she earns 8,000 PHP doing this type of business.  She requested a loan of 9,000 PHP to procure more bananas to vend. Alma has been a member of GDMPC since 2008. 

In the future, Alma wants to improve her house and to see her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to procure more bananas to vend.

loans.name: Vanessa  Aleli

texts.en:
Vanessa is a 20-year-old married woman and mother of a three-month-old baby. She is from Antequera, Bohol, and she raises hogs. Aside from hog raising, she also engages in basket weaving during her spare time for additional income. Her husband is a driver.

Vanessa requested a loan of 4,000 PHP to purchase materials for basket weaving like nito (palm), as well as additional piglets, feed, and pig supplements. Vanessa would like to improve her business by investing in other ventures in order to support her family and have a sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to buy materials like palm, piglets, and feed.

loans.name: Crusita Mercedes

texts.es: La señora crusita es una mujer abnegada, emprendedora y entusiasta, dedicada exclusivamente a su actividad comercial la que vio crecer y desarrollar a la   que ama, como lo hace con su familia, es casada con una hija ya casada también, por lo que su tiempo lo relaciona con el trabajo, su actividad comercial  es venta de ropa, el que promueve de manera ambulante y por encargo, actualmente está necesitando un financiamiento para cubrir la demanda existente ya que le está permitiendo la oportunidad de negocio por la fecha especial de estas actividades, por eso se presento a ceprodel  para solicitar un financiamiento para la compra de Toga, Pantalones y Zapatos, lo que le permitirá aumentar los niveles de venta y por ende las condiciones y nivel de vida.
texts.en: Crusita is a selfless, enterprising, and enthusiastic woman who is completely dedicated to her business, which she has seen grow and develop.  She loves her business, as she works with her family.  She is married and has a daughter who is already married, which is why she associates her time with her with work.  Her business is selling clothing and she carries it out on foot and by order.  She currently needs financing to cover her demand, as she has a business opportunity at a special event for her kind of business.  This is why she went to Ceprodel to apply for a loan to buy robes, pants, and shoes, which will allow her to increase her sales and, consequently, her living conditions and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy robes, pants, and shoes

loans.name: Ma. Janice

texts.en:
Ma. Janice was only 22 years old when she engaged herself in the retailing business. She got married early, and is blessed with two children. Ma. Janice is now 28 and still managing her business. 

Her husband is her partner in managing for the the growth of her business.  Ma. Janice is selling vegetables, fish, meat and spices in their village. Her income from the business is already enough to sustain their household expense, but Ma. Janice still wants to increase her profits from the business to have savings. Hence, Ma. Janice is borrowing  PHP 50,000 to buy snack foods, soft drinks and beverages to sell. 

She hopes to increase her profit and save some of it for the preparation of her children's education.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, soft drinks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en: Perlita is 35 years old and lives in Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married with three children. For eight years, Perlita has owned and operated a retail store at home selling mostly grocery items like shampoo, noodles, soap, toothpaste, and rice. She earns 7,500 PHP a month from the store along with other sources. She has requested a loan of 8,500 PHP from GDMPC to purchase new items and to expand her product offering. Perlita has been a member of GDMPC since 2007. In the future, Perlita hopes to expand and improve store operations to sustain the day to day needs of the family.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offerings.

loans.name: Tatiana Paola

texts.es: Tatiana de 43 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias y allí se dedica a la elaboración de productos artesanales y además a la venta de productos de belleza. Con su negocio, iniicado hace 2 años,  contribuye con el sustento de su familia, especialmente de su hija de 1 año de edad, a quien quiere proveerle lo mejor, con el fin de lograr su bienestar integral. Oriunda de un municipio del departamento de Bolivar, aprendió a elaborar artesanias, las que son reconocidas por su tradicion cultural en su natal San Jacinto. Sus esfuerzos por salir adelante la han llevado a dedicarse tambien a la actividad comercial, vendiendo puerta a puerta, para hacer crecer su negocio y mantener su hogar. Poco a poco ha logrado aumentar su capital, pero su creciente clientela, especialmente en este último trimestre del año, ha aumentado la demanda de sus productos y por eso está aplicando a un credikiva, primer finaciamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará broches, ganchos, aplicaciones para mochilas, e hilos telas y piedrería. Su  meta  en su negocio,  es lograr un mayor crecimiento trabajando esmeradamente, para salir adelante, con la ayuda de Dios.
texts.en: Tatiana is 43 years old.  She lives in the city of Cartagena de Indias where she makes handicrafts and sells beauty products.  With her business, which she started two years ago, she contributes to her family's upkeep and especially to that of her one-year-old daughter, whom she wants to provide with the best so that she has the best possible well-being.  A native of a municipality in the department of Bolivar, she learned to make handicrafts, which are recognizable as part of the traditional culture of her native San Jacinto.  Her efforts to get ahead have led her to work in sales as well, selling door-to-door to make her business grow and to support her household.  Little by little she has been able to increase her capital, but her growing clientele, especially in this last trimester of the year, has increased demand for her products.  This is why she is applying for a Kiva loan, which will be her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and which she will use to buy brooches, hairpins, patches for backpacks, and thread, fabrics, and gems.  Her goal is to grow her business by working carefully, so that, with God's help, she can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy brooches, hairpins, patches for backpacks, and thread, fabric, and gems

loans.name: Vilma Lorena

texts.es: La señora Vilma trabaja como maestra de educación primaria, en un colegio de la localidad donde habita, actualmente tiene a su cargo a los niños pequeños entre 5 y 8 años, a los que le brinda todo el esmero y atención que merecen,  esta señora solicita un préstamo a ceprodel ya que Precisa  el mejoramiento de techo y pared, debe  comprar: Cemento, Arena, Piedra Cantera , Zinc y  Mano de Obra, lo que vendría a mejorar las condiciones y nivel de vida de su familia, de esta manera agradece a ceprodel por la oportunidad de poder realizar la obra de construcción que necesita.
texts.en: Vilma works as an elementary school teacher in a school in the location where she lives.  She has two children in her care who are 5 and 8 years old; she gives them all the care and attention they deserve.  She’s asking Ceprodel for a loan because she needs to repair the roof and walls.  She must buy cement, sand, paving stones, metal sheeting and pay labor costs which will lead to improved living conditions and living standard of her family.  She thanks Ceprodel for the opportunity to do the construction job she needs.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.es: Vanessa de 25 años de edad,  vive en  Cartagena de Indias,  hermosa e histórica ciudad costera,  en el Caribe Colombiano; allí tiene una miscelánea donde vende de todo un poco,  especialmente ropa proveniente desde los Estados Unidos de América, de donde se la envía su suegra. Vanessa vive con su cónyuge y su pequeño hijo, de 6 años, con quien sueña, verlo  convertido en una persona muy exitosa. Esta es la razón por la cual se esfuerza en trabajar persistentemente, con tal de lograr su propósito. Vanessa aprovecha todas las temporadas del año, para invertirle a su negocio y este final de año, lleno de fiestas familiares, no es la excepción, porque hay dinero circulante en a calle y todos se preparan para gastar. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará ropa, y juguetería, que son los artículos que mas vende  en el mes de Diciembre, experiencia que ha consolidado en sus 4 años de tener el negocio, apoyado por su suegra, quien como habita en Los Estados Unidos, le envía todo lo que necesita y  que los almacenes ofrecen con  descuentos,  porque han pasado las temporadas en las cuales son compradas por los norteamericanos y estos dejan de adquirirlas. Sus ventas las realiza a crédito y también de contado a sus principales clientes, que son los vecinos de su sector,  quienes  diariamente pasan por su miscelánea de Vanessa para conocer que tiene de nuevo y comprarle.
texts.en:
Vanessa, 25, lives in Cartagena de Indias, a beautiful, historic, coastal city on the shores of the Colombian Caribbean.  She has a variety store there where she sells a little bit of everything, especially clothes from the United States of America her mother-in-law sends her from there.  Vanessa lives with her spouse and little six-year-old son who she dreams with seeing become a very successful person.  This is why she works persistently to reach her goal.  Vanessa takes advantage of all seasons of the year to invest in her business and this final one of the year that’s filled with family gatherings is no exception because there is cash circulating in the streets and everyone is ready to spend.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, that she’ll use to buy clothes and toys which is what she sells most in December, something she’s learned from her four years’ experience in business.   She gets support from her mother-in-law who lives in the United States; she sends her everything she needs that's on sale in stores because it's off-season and North Americans aren’t buying any longer.  She sells on credit and also for cash to her main customers who are her local neighbors who come by Vanessa’s variety store daily to see what new things she has available for sale.

loans.use: to buy clothes and toys.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a photocopier machine.

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Janice is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy raw materials for her abaca weaving business. Janice has been in this business for three years. Janice earns more income from hog raising.

Janice has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her abaca weaving business.

loans.name: Heydi Francisca

texts.es:
Existen  Personas Comprometidas al Desarrollo de la Familia Diversificando sus modalidades de ingresos de acuerdo a los medios que poseen, la señora Heydi es una de esas personas, además de ser Maestra de educación primaria de un colegio de la localidad, también  aprovecha las condiciones Urbanas donde habita para emprender otra actividad  como es la Venta de Fritanga y Cosméticos, por tal Razón  decidió visitar las oficinas de ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un financiamiento y poder lograr el objetivo percibido, dicho crédito lo utilizara en la compra de carne de pollo, res, cerdo , tomates , cebolla, tortillas, perfumes, refresc, maquillaje, cremas para el cuerpo, brillos, lápiz labial, crema Anew.
 Es Soltera con 1 hijos a las que les está brindando todo el apoyo para el desarrollo académico, su esposo trabaja en  panamá, en el área de construcción, esta actividad que convina es por el salario bajo del maestro, y tiene que buscar otros ingresos para mejorar sus condiciones y nivel de vida
texts.en:
People exist who are committed to family development and diversify their sources of income according to the means at hand.  Heydi is one of these people.  In addition to being an elementary school teacher at a local school, she also takes advantage of the urban conditions she lives in to carry out another activity like selling fast-food and cosmetics.  This is why she decided to visit Ceprodel’s offices to have the benefit of a loan to reach her perceived goal.  She will use said loan to buy chicken, beef, pork, tomatoes, onions, tortillas, perfumes, Refresc, make-up, body creams, lip gloss, lipstick and Anew cream.

She’s single with a one son she’s providing with academic development.  Her husband works in Panama in construction.  The activity she does is due to the low salary teachers earn and she must look for other sources of income to improve her conditions and standard of living.

loans.use: to buy beef, chicken, pork, tomatoes, onions, tortillas, perfume, Refresc, make-up, body cream, lip gloss, lipsticks and Anew creams.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.en:
A beautiful woman by the name of Mavluda lives in a house which is in bad condition. She is 53 years old. 

Mavluda is a divorcee and has a son. For more than 24 years, she has been an accountant in an organization. She has not enough salary to repair her house.  She must repair the roof of her house first, and then repair all rooms. She is asking for a loan of 4000 somoni to repair her house. In this way she will be able to offer her family a better quality of life and moral stability that will allow them to progress. 

Each month she will make her payment on time. She awaits your support and mercy. Please, help her and her family if it is possible.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as wood, slate and cement for repairing her house.

loans.name: Maria Josefa

texts.es:
La señora María, se dedica arduamente  a laborar como maestra, actualmente esta desempeñándose como Asesora Pedagógica, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace 17 años, es casada con 3 hijos a quienes les está brindando el apoyo para su desarrollo académico.

Una de las necesidades que la señora María atraviesa hoy en día es de mejorar su vivienda con el anexo  de cuartos y cocina,   lo que le permitió tomar la decisión de solicitar un crédito a ceprodel para la compra de; ladrillos, cemento, varilla de hierro 3/8, corrugada, varilla de hierro lisa de ¼, perlines, zinc, alambre de amarre, golosos, piedrín , arena, pintura anticorrosiva, thinner, clavos y mano de obra, de esta manera mejorar las condiciones familiares, efectuando este gran esfuerzo que es la única manera para lograr el objetivo a través del financiamiento oportuno.
texts.en:
Mrs. María works hard as a teacher. She is now working as a pedagogic advisor, and has been doing so for seventeen years. She is married and has three children that get her support for their academic activities.

Mrs. María has currently the need to improve her house by building some rooms and a kitchen. This is why she decided to request a loan at CEPRODEL in order to buy bricks, cement, 3/8 in. corrugated iron rods, 1/4 in. straight iron rods, purlins, zinc sheets, wire, screws, gravel, sand, anti-corrosion paint, thinner, nails and to pay for the labor. In this way she will improve her family’s living conditions. The loan is the only way of reaching her goal, which requires great efforts.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as bricks, cement, gravel and sand.

loans.name: Adilia Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora Adilia Beatriz trabaja para una institución pública en el municipio de La paz centro desde hace 4 años como apoyo a la mujer con ayuda social y moral también se desempeña como profesora en una escuela pública desde hace 31 años con lo que ha sacado adelante su familia de dos hijos, brindándole estudio, alimentación y demás necesidades básicas del hogar.

Actualmente solicita un crédito a ceprodel  lo requiere para mejora de vivienda para comenzar a construir una pared y cambiar el piso de la casa dándole una mejor condición de vida a su familia
texts.en:
Adilia Beatriz has worked for a public institution in the La Paz Centro municipality for the last four years as moral and social support for women. She has also served as a public school teacher for the last 31 years which has helped her family get ahead; offering an apartment, food and other basic household needs. 

She is currently applying for a loan from CEPRODEL for home improvement to start building a wall and change the floor of the home giving a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: with the construction of a wall and change of flooring.
